ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This article is based on information collated by GLANSIS over a period of more than 20 years. The coauthors on the original GLANSIS plant profiles include L. Cao, J. Larson, L. Berent, A. Fusaro, S. Iott, V.M. Howard, C.C. Jacono, V.H. Morgan, I.A. Pfingsten, M.M. Richerson, R.M. Kipp, M. McCarthy, D.D. Thayer, K. Dettloff, W. Conard, K. Hopper, and P. Alsip. GLANSIS functions as a regional node of the USGS Nonindigenous Aquatic Species (NAS) database ( https://nas.er.usgs.gov/ accessed on 15 January 2021). The NAS database tracks original references for each of the thousands of specimen records included in the geographic analysis presented here as well as provides more extensive bibliographies for each species.
